subject: Order
description_text: Hello. Ive placed an order for some bits. Order number #SSN2857. Can you confirm i did ask for two clutch brackets and also will the power supply be a uk plug. Thank you and keep up the good work your products are amazing. Daryl

conversations.body_text: Hi Daryl Newbury,    Iâ€™ve checked your order and added notes for two clutch brackets and a UK plug.  Our operations team will process the order according to your request.
